text:

a new you. Stay tuned for four crazy facts

about the sweat you're going to work up when
you hit the gym.

So what are we doing here?

Performance reviews! Uh, I mean, resolutions.
Yeah, let's go with resolutions. We as a team

resolve to bring you brand new chemistry videos
every two weeks in 2016.

Starting in 2016, you'll also be able to watch
all of our new videos with subtitles. And
not just when Sophia eats pie.

My primary motivation for working out is to
eat more pie.
I also resolve to take more wine baths because, well, we've got this perfectly good kiddie pool.

I also plan to work more Star Wars references
into our episodes primarily because I'd like

to be green-screened into the Dagobah system.
I don't think it's fair that Matt gets to

What's your chemistry resolution for 2016?
